description: kmeans Clustering. Separate samples in groups of equal variance

param.name: n_int
param.description: this runs the how much centroids when running

param.name: max_iter
param.description: Maximum number of iterations of the k-means algorithm for a single run.

param.name: tollerance
param.description: Relative tolerance with regards to inertia to declare convergence

param.name: n_clusters
param.description: The number of clusters to find
